channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Illinois bans corporal punishment in all schools
item.description: Illinois will soon become just the fifth state in the nation to prohibit corporal punishment in all schools

item.title: In pictures: The award-winning designs of the £30m Bayesian superyacht
Best outdoor patio furniture sets for Labor Day entertaining
item.description: Discover the best outdoor patio furniture sets for all budgets at Wayfair, Amazon, Walmart and more.

item.title: DHS watchdog warns of 'urgent issue' regarding unaccompanied children
item.description: Homeland Security's internal watchdog says it has uncovered an "urgent issue" with how immigration officials handle cases involving unaccompanied migrant children.

item.title: The 38 Absolute Funniest Tweets And Memes From Night One Of The DNC
How Democrats united at DNC to thank Biden, endorse Harris
item.description: On the first day of the Democratic National Convention, Democrats from several factions of the party encouraged the crowd to rally around Vice President Kamala Harris as she prepares to accept the nomination to run against former President Donald Trump in November. Ashley Etienne, a CBS News political contributor and former communications director for Vice President Kamala Harris, joins CBS News with more on the DNC.

item.title: Kamala Harris is a stepmom of 2: What to know about her family
item.description: Harris met her husband, Second Gentleman Doug Emhoff, in her 40s.

item.title: Russia says it thwarts attacks in Kursk region, advances in east Ukraine
Former officer convicted in George Floyd murder released from prison
item.description: One of the former Minneapolis police officers convicted in the murder of George Floyd has been released from custody, according to the Federal Bureau of Prisons.

item.title: DeSantis-backed school board candidates face off in Florida
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis isn’t on the ballot — but his education agenda is

item.title: Stellantis says union can't strike over Belvidere, claims it hasn't violated commitments
Rescue crews race to find survivors after luxury yacht sinks in Mediterranean
item.description: Rescue teams are searching for survivors after a luxury yacht was struck by a sudden storm off the coast of Sicily. The storm left at least one person dead and 15 others were rescued. Six people, including tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch, remain missing.

item.title: Coco Gauff will be on boxes of Wheaties a year after her US Open title
item.description: A year after becoming a Grand Slam champion, Coco Gauff is teaming up with the “Breakfast of Champions.”

item.title: Trump Melts Down After Harris’s Debate Decision Leaves Him Rattled
Ukraine claims capture of 92 settlements in Russia's Kursk region
item.description: Ukraine says it has captured 92 settlements so far in the Russian Kursk region. This comes after President Volodymyr Zelenskyy revealed the goal of the surprise incursion is to create a buffer zone with Russia. CBS News' Ian Lee reports from the Ukraine-Russia border.
